author: marvin
msg: LUCY-168 Detect sys/stat.h mkdir under Cygwin.
Always run the code which looks for POSIX mkdir() from sys/stat.h instead of
limiting ourselves to Microsoft options when windows.h is detected.

author: hwright
msg: Start encapsulating the various bits of the release document into the three
sections mentioned in the preface.  This is partly a test commit to see how
the styles shake out, since I don't have a full httpd instance running on my
(release-numbering, name-reuse, deprecation): Bump all these down one
header level and put them in release-process.
